name: Ideas inc.
description:
IDEAS INC.

A game about a machine that sorts the right "marble" to the right person!

Made during Glasgow Unibosi & Surge Game Jam(48h) by the Lockdown Lobby.

Designers/Programmers:

(Reorso)Riccardo Testa - https://twitter.com/Reorso_Head
Matthew Hansson - matthewcalvinhansson@gmail.com

Artists:

Daniel Kowalski - https://kowal42.itch.io/
Elisa Vanuccini - https://drive.google.com/drive/folders/1qFbN66iOb1nhOPJBNdgys5yeeD4JCna3?usp=sharing
Vida Boudin - boudinvida@gmail.com
Nina Taylor - taylor.ninav@hotmail.com

Our team thanks the jury for choosing this game as the winner of the jam (category:web game)! 

Link to UNBOSI's website: http://www.unbosi.org/the-unbosi-game-jam/

Link to Surge's website: http://www.surge.scot/

Enjoy!
